articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Telford child sex abuse went on for generations, inquiry finds
articles.description: Agencies blamed children and not perpetrators for the abuse suffered in Telford, the report says.
articles.content:
Obvious evidence of child sex crimes in Telford was ignored for generations leading to more than 1,000 girls being abused, an inquiry has found.
Agencies blamed children for the abuse they suffered,… [+12415 chars]

articles.title: Twitter sues Elon Musk over $44bn purchase deal
articles.description: Twitter sues billionaire Elon Musk in an attempt to force through his $44bn deal to buy the social media giant.
articles.content:
